item.description:
This Eberron campaign will meet once a month for roughly 4 hours at The Temple in Pawtucket, culminating in the final episode at TempleCon 2011. This campaign will be episodic with an over arcing story heavy on story, continuity and role playing. You do not need to have played in the previous adventures to play in this one.

Loreweaver has confirmed that the ritual in House Tharashk's possession is indeed the ritual of the Draconic Prophecy. He wishes to speak with you at Zarash'ak to discuss the ritual and ask a favor.

-Characters are now level 8. You are allowed one level 9 magic item, one level 8 magic item, and one level 7 magic item from the allowed books. You also have 2600 gold.

-the ONLY source material allowed to be used are the PHB, PHB 2, PHB 3, the Eberron Players Guide and Adventurer's Vault 1, be sure to check the errata for all books here. You must take all races, classes, feats, and magic item choices from those books ONLY. This campaign will be cheddar-light. If you are looking for a min/max meat grinder, look elsewhere.

-Characters must be approved one week before game time.

- Regular attendance ensures you a spot at the final episode, which will take place at Templecon 2011.

-Players will treat everyone with respect and remember that the object of the game is for everyone to have fun, not just one person

- Capping the group at 6 players, will run a second group if needed.
item.name: D&D 4th Edition 8th level Eberron campaign leading to TempleCon, Part 4 of 6
